title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Design-Based Workshop for Learning Design Theory Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply analytical (problem-based) and creative (solution-based) approaches to learning and skill theory development according to situational contexts.
Learners can build a theory-practice integration model in simulation/VR environments using reflective practice (reflection-in-action) techniques.
Learners can explore new theoretical possibilities in language learning design by applying a dialogic interpretation framework.

Learners can analyze formative assessment feedback (e.g., quiz results, learner surveys) and develop one AI education prototype reflecting instructional design theories (e.g., ADDIE model) within three weeks. They can perform a process where at least two out of three peer evaluators provide feedback indicating "no need for improvement" in two or fewer items.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
